1.text: AND thou shalt say in that day: I will give thanks to thee, O Lord, for thou wast angry with me: thy wrath is turned away, and thou hast comforted me.

2.text: Behold, God is my saviour, I will deal confidently, and will not fear: because the Lord is my strength, and my praise, and he is become my salvation.

3.text: You shall draw waters with joy out of the saviourâ€™s fountains:

4.text: And you shall say in that day: Praise ye the Lord, and call upon his name: make his works known among the people: remember that his name is high.

5.text: Sing ye to the Lord, for he hath done great things: shew this forth in all the earth.

6.text: Rejoice, and praise, O thou habitation of Sion: for great is he that is in the midst of thee, the Holy One of Israel.
